quotes.quote:
And malt does more than Milton can
To justify God's ways to man.
quotes.author: A. E. Housman

quotes.quote: Electricity is actually made up of extremely tiny particles called electrons, that you cannot see with the naked eye unless you have been drinking.
quotes.author: Dave Barry

quotes.quote: If you drink, don't drive. Don't even putt.
quotes.author: Dean Martin

quotes.quote: Bacchus hath drowned more men than Neptune.
quotes.author: Dr. Thomas Fuller

quotes.quote: Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut.
quotes.author: Ernest Hemingway

quotes.quote: Great people talk about ideas, average people talk about things, and small people talk about wine.
quotes.author: Fran Lebowitz

quotes.quote: My Grandmother is over eighty and still doesn't need glasses. Drinks right out of the bottle.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: When I read about the evils of drinking, I gave up reading.
quotes.author: Henny Youngman

quotes.quote: [Water is] the only drink for a wise man.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.quote: It is better to hide ignorance, but it is hard to do this when we relax over wine.
quotes.author: Heraclitus

quotes.quote: The wine urges me on, the bewitching wine, which sets even a wise man to singing and to laughing gently and rouses him up to dance and brings forth words which were better unspoken.
quotes.author: Homer

quotes.quote: Nothing anyone says in a bar is true.
quotes.author: Martin Mull

quotes.quote: The trouble with jogging is that the ice falls out of your glass.
quotes.author: Nancy Astor

quotes.quote: One reason I don't drink is that I want to know when I am having a good time.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: I envy people who drink. At least they have something to blame everything on.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: Work is the curse of the drinking classes.
quotes.author: Robert Benchley

quotes.quote: Drinking makes such fools of people, and people are such fools to begin with, that it's compounding a felony.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: I always keep a supply of stimulant handy in case I see a snake--which I also keep handy.
quotes.author: W. C. Fields

quotes.quote: Reminds me of my safari in Africa. Somebody forgot the corkscrew and for several days we had to live on nothing but food and water.
quotes.author: W. Somerset Maugham

quotes.quote: It's always difficult to make conversation with a drunk, and there's no denying it, the sober are at a disadvantage with him.
